attributes.action: Give Tim Moore knighthood, his bravery and kindness needs recognition
attributes.additional_details: I think all the doom and gloom of the current circumstances, we as a nation deserve to celebrate something special and I think this man along with all front line staff deserve the recognition for there actions and resilience
attributes.background: I would like the government to recognise this individual, he is a true gentleman his brave service for his queen and country and then to do what he is at 99 to raise money for the NHS is truly remarkable

rejection.details:
In any case we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at

www.gov.uk/honours
